name: [GameDevTV GameJam] Death For Growth
description:
A game made entirely on-stream in 10 days, (technically less since i missed a couple days!!) I thoroughly hope you enjoy it as much as I enjoyed making it. I intend to do more with this, so just as the theme was "Death is only the Beginning", the outcome of this project is.. well... Only the Beginning!

CAREFUL! - There is currently a bug where going back to the menu & trying to play again causes the game to crash... 😅will fix very soon after I get some rest.

Controls:

Movement - W A S D 

Attack - Left Mouse

Block - C

Interact - F

Dodge Roll - Spacebar

Rotate Camera - Right Mouse & Drag

Zoom Camera / Scroll Interact List - Mouse Wheel

Pause - Escape
